ifYouAreInterestedPleaseSendAMessage: If you are interested please send {{name}} a message
imInterestedInThisBulkyItem: I'm interested in your {{name}}, is it still available? When could I pick it up?
loopIsNotUsingThisApp: Loop '{{name}}' is not using this App
pleaseContactYourLoopHost: The host(s) of the Loop have decided not to use the My Clothing Loop app. Please contact your Loop Host for further information.
pleaseEnableLoopApp:
This Loop is set not to use the My Clothing Loop app.
Please edit your Loop on the website.
clickOnBagToChangeHolder: Click on the bag to change bag holder
title: Titre
resetDescription: Reset all rules to template rules written by the Clothing Loop
areYouSureYouWantToResetRules: Are you sure you want to reset the Loop Rules to the current defaults?
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteBag: Are you sure you want to delete bag {{name}}?
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteThisBulkyItem: Are you sure you want to delete this bulky item?
routePrivacyInfo: Set visibility of participants within a loop.
routePrivacyDescription: Participants will be able to access {{count}} above and {{count}} below in the route.
routePrivacyDescription_zero: Participants will not be able to access other participant's data in the route.
routePrivacyDescriptionAll: Participants will be able to access every participant's data in the route.
pleaseEnterYourEmailAddress: Please enter your email address, a one time password will be sent to you.
enterThePasscodeYouReceivedInYourEmail: Enter the Passcode you received in your email.
areYouSureYouWantToLogout: Are you sure you want to logout?
deleteAccountExplanation: To permanently delete your Clothing Loop account; please <1>click here</1> to open the web portal, (follow the login instructions if you are not logged in), then click the 'Delete Account' button
areYouSureUnPause: Are you sure you want to Un-pause?
yourParticipationIsPausedClick: Your participation is paused. Click the button to rejoin.
untilITurnItBackOn: Until I turn it back on
setTimerForACoupleOfWeeks: Select how many weeks you want to pause your participation
updateHeaderDesc: This change will be visible to all loop members.
resetHeadersDesc: Reset your loop's headers to the default headers.
areYouSureYouWantToResetHeaders: Are you sure you want to reset the loop's headers to defualt?
